alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Ontario; Orleans; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 11:52PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN WYOMING...LIVINGSTON... EASTERN ORLEANS...MONROE...EASTERN GENESEE AND WESTERN ONTARIO COUNTIES THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hamlin Beach State Park to near Le Roy to near Portageville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Chili, Brockport, Geneseo, East Rochester, Hilton, Webster, Fairport, Dansville, Brighton, Gates-North Gates, Letchworth State Park, Hamlin Beach State Park, Henrietta, Penfield, Le Roy, Perry, and Spencerport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 390 between exits 5 and 12. Interstate 90 between exits 44 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Genesee; Livingston; Monroe; Ontario; Orleans; Wyoming
